latest_revision.text:
=Overview=
The lab has 12 laptops for hosting classes and events. These were [https://groups.google.com/g/heatsynclabs/c/q1L8OEhr43w/m/EY0JtLqNAQAJ proposed in 2020]. This [https://groups.google.com/g/heatsynclabs/c/LZDUuxmxo6s/ post] has specifics on the laptops. 

Dell Latitude E7470 (Refurbished)
*Intel Core i5-6200U / Core i5-6300U
*Intel HD Graphics 520
*8GB DDR4 (4GB x 2)
*256GB M2 Solid State Drive
*14" Full HD 1920x1080 screen
*Windows 10 Pro

=Software=
Item's installed via tha Ninite file on the desktop; Chrome
*Firefox
*Edge
*Krita
*Blender
*gimp
*Irfanview
*Inkscape
*Libre office
*Sumatra pdf
*7zip
*VLC
*Audacity
*keepass
*Notepad++
*Eclipse*Visual Studio

Other software not included with Ninite
*Arduino (original not 2.0)
*Fusion 360
*Silhouette Studio
*Roblox
*Prusa Slicer
*OBS

=Other configuration=
We have Bob Ross printer driver installed, but not defaulted so that people don't accidentally print a bunch of pages.

To Do: Map the the \\files\users folder as U:\
